text:
Chatlio | Senior Software Engineer Golang | Remote only | HQ in Seattle

Chatlio (https://chatlio.com/) is live-chat software that allows you to chat with your sites visitors and customers directly from Slack. We are small and seeking someone with strong golang skills and enjoys working remotely with small team.

details => https://chatlio.com/jobs/#senior-golang-engineer Mention HN on your email if you apply :)
